about_the_game:
.


Slave Of The Police Officer is a visual novel for adult audiences. This game is about a police officer who was a sex maniac. He wanted to rape a woman for a long time and now he got a girl Clara. He raped her for a long time.

This game will tell you a story about a policeman who turned out to be a sex maniac. He interrogates a young girl Clara in the police station. Nothing portends trouble as he decides to rape the poor girl. He locks her in shackles and fucks her unmercifully in every possible place. Clara can't do anything to him and he enjoys her defenselessness and pain. But at some point it all takes a slightly bizarre turn of events....

What awaits you in the game:
Lots of sex animations.
Realistic graphics.
Awesome music.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains sexual violence, sexual relations without consent, bondage and BDSM. All characters shown in the game are over 18 years old.
